bio: 1979- Semifinalist at Wimbledon; Quarterfinalist at U.S. Open
Runner-Up: 1978-Mexico City, Tulsa, Tokyo, Hong Kong; 1979-Lafayette, Tokyo,
All-American at Stanford. Recipient of American Youth Award in 1979.
Suffered herniated disc in his back, February 1980.
